title: 有比较美观易懂的血条mod吗
author: 无奈丶屮艸
txt_content:
之前加了个血条mod，然后发现血条一显示就会白屏

版本1.8
还有其他好用的吗

replies.author: 天蝎_心殇
replies.txt_content:
[血量显示]HealthBar by connection_lost
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-325521-1-1.html

[血量名称显示]LifeGauge 
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-525455-1-1.html

[简洁的血条显示]Neat
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-526691-1-1.html

[简洁血量条]Simple HP Bars
